$Jeter tried to go from 1B to 3B when it was left uncovered; catcher Huckaby ran to 3B to cover and when he fell his shinguard drove into Jeter's shoulder; after a 12 minute delay, Jeter taken to hospital with separated shoulderm on DL for 6 weeks

$Vernon Wells hit a line drive up the middle that hit the pitcher and was caught by 3rd baseman Hank Blalock on the fly; Mike Bordick was rounding 2B so Blalock lobbed the ball right over the 1st baseman's head and into the stands; Bordick was awarded 3B but never retouched 2B; Texas appealed at 2B and Bordick was called out

ej,towej001,P,poncl901,Throwing at batter Blue Jays Josh Towers ejected by HP umpire Larry Poncino for throwing a pitch behind Aubrey Huff

ej,lopea003,P,poncl901,Throwing at batter ej,crawc002,P,poncl901,Fighting with Lopez ej,sturt001,P,poncl901,Fighting after Lopez threw at Crawford $Blue Jays Aquilino Lopez threw behind Carl Crawford; benches cleared; Crawford had to be restrained; Lopez, Crawford and Tanyon Sturtze were ejected by HP umpire Larry Poncino; Miller originally credited with save, but proper reading of rule 10.20 indicates that he did not enter in a save situation; he inherited a 2-0 count on a batter who walked but that essentially created his own save situation which is not permitted
$Delgado becomes the 15th player to hit 4 homers in 1 game; the 6th to do it in consecutive at bats
